item.description:
Let's do comfort food again! This is our one year group birthday so I will bake a cake.

If you have been to our dinners one or more times I especially hope you will attend this special occasion.

I might bring out the dining room table for this one...maybe.

You know the drillâ€¦
Plan to assemble or cook on site unless your dish takes more than an hour to prepare. Bring any special equipment but I have standard kitchen tools and supplies.
item.how_to_find_us: we are back at the penthouse to celebrate one year!
item.name: One Year Group Anniversary
